name: Portarumaku
description:
Portarumaku is a muti-verse bullet hell where you have to adapt to and survive the onslaught of attacks from different universes! Play as a little witch who's trying to defeat the multi-dimensional angel!

Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Move mouse to Aim
  • Left Mouse Button to Shoot
  • Hold Shift to move Slower and see Hitbox
